middleware.name: core-make
middleware.desc:
Core Make build system provides the make build files and scripts for building and programming ModusToolbox™ applications. Builds can be run either through a command-line interface (CLI) or through ModusToolbox™ Integrated Development Environment (IDE).
Additional Information:
  • Core Make build system README.md
  • Core Make build system RELEASE.md

middleware.name: mtb-pdl-cat5
middleware.desc: The Peripheral Driver Library (PDL) integrates device header files, startup code, and low-level peripheral drivers into a single package.

middleware.name: mtb-hal-cat5
middleware.desc: CYW55500 Hardware Abstraction Layer package, provides a set of APIs to initialize, configure, and use the CYW55500 MCU resources using the ModusToolbox™ Hardware Abstraction Layer.

middleware.name: recipe-make-cat5
middleware.desc: CYW55500 Make build recipe provides the make files and scripts for building and programming CYW55500 applications.

middleware.name: core-lib
middleware.desc: The Core Library provides device agnostic utilities that all middleware can rely on. This includes a generic result type and some common utility functions.

middleware.name: device-db
middleware.desc: Device database provides device information for project-creator, configurators, and other tools.

middleware.name: abstraction-rtos
middleware.desc:
The RTOS Abstraction Library provides a generic API that allows ModusToolbox™ middleware to be written in an RTOS agnostic manner. It also contains implementations of the Abstraction Layer for FreeRTOS, CMSIS RTOS, and ThreadX.

Note: This library has specific requirements on the underlying RTOS configuration. See the Readme.md file for details.
